AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: first generation
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the earliest generation of carniculus. [PAWN_nameDef]'s offsprings were used in horrible experiments but [PAWN_nameDef] itself was treated well.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: maze runner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Every day [PAWN_nameDef] was thrown into inorganic maze and forced to run around trying to find the exit. Stopping meant physical punishment and no supper.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: electric shock test subject
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Scientists used to give him electric shocks to [PAWN_nameDef] to examine nerve systems, or just for recreation. On the day of the rebellion, [PAWN_pronoun] was able to find familiar scientistsand retaliate.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: chemical test subject
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was exposed to all manner of poisons and chemicals to test for chemical resistance. Others died, but [PAWN_nameDef] was able to survive, leaving some damages to his intellect.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: reproductive system test subject
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Scientists poked and tinkered with [PAWN_nameDef]'s reproductive organs and performed various experiments. Its purpose was to study carniculus' fertility but some scientists used [PAWN_possessive] body only for their curiosity.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: leftover stock
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] classed as excess product, shoved into a dark and unsanitary container with his siblings. They were supposed to be used for some kind of experiment or incinerated eventually, but before that could happen, the rebellion broke out and [PAWN_nameDef] and the others were released.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: wasted corpse
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Pretending to be dead to escape the harsh experiments, [PAWN_nameDef] was sent to the disposal section by an unwary scientist. Then [PAWN_pronoun] survived hiding in a gap in the equipments nearby incineration plant, snacking on the garbage and corpses of other carniculus as they were sent in.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: feral carniculus
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grown up like wild animal in nature, without knowing [PAWN_pronoun] origin.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: alpha male
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a male carnicles who acts like a boss monkey. [PAWN_possessive] head is full of desire to kill other males and mate with all kinds of females.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: matriarch
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is the eldest female in the group. Any male creature that catches [PAWN_possessive] eyes will be squeezed until [PAWN_pronoun] gets bored.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: stud carniculus
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was used for breeding as a standard male carniculus. [PAWN_possessive] brain was chemically and surgically stimulated and trained to attempt to mate with anything moving.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: broodcarniculus
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was used for breeding as a standard female carniculus. [PAWN_possessive] body was secured in a mating stall and [PAWN_possessive] vagina was always penetrated by either a sex organ or a medical device.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: butcher
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] loves meat.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: torturer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] loves guts.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: animal breeder
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is very proud to become the one to keep other lifeform.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: farmhand
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is fascinated by the serene organic relationship between soil and plants.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: killer T
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a reliable guard who has strongly inherited the propaties of immune defence cells.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: macrophage
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is as gluttonous and robust as a phagocyte.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: constructor
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] has a certain admiration for hard, inorganic materials.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: fleshtailor
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is obsessed with crafts and clothing culture and is always pondering what he can create with his tentacle-like fingers.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: rabid carniculus
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: From previous experiences, [PAWN_nameDef] views all humans as enemies.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: cattle fucker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: A colony was having problems with livestock having unnatural pregnancies and giving birth to eerily deformed babies. Investigation revealed that it was caused by [PAWN_nameDef] living nearby, and [PAWN_pronoun] was hunted and had to abandon [PAWN_possessive] home.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: cattle killer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was feared in neighboring colonies as a carnivorous monster that devours livestocks. After escaping from hunters, [PAWN_pronoun] is looking for a new feeding ground.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: kidnapper
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: To distract from loneliness, [PAWN_nameDef] would often kidnap human children to the cave where [PAWN_pronoun] lived. No one knew what went on in the cave, but the children never returned home, only [PAWN_nameDef] would come out for new kid.
